description: Office or work chairs,  office furniture
tags: Request for proposals (RFQ), Canadian Free Trade Agreement
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement for Furniture Package 04 

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a tender notice for Furniture Package 04: Task and Conference Chairs, Stools. 

#### Tender Details

| Details | Date | Deadline |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3843378354 | - |
| Publication Date | February 23, 2023 | - |
| Tender Closing Date | March 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT | - |

#### Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires a supply of task and conference chairs, stools, and related furniture. The requirement falls under product categories 56101700 (Office Furniture) and 56101720 (Office or Work Chair).

#### Evaluation Criteria

Tenders will be evaluated on the basis of lowest price. The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking offers from suppliers who can provide furniture meeting the required specifications.

#### Contact Information

For inquiries regarding this tender notice, please contact Kristen Schultz at Kristen.Schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

#### Trade Agreements

This tender notice is open to suppliers who meet the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Note:

* The tender closing date and time has been updated to 2:00 PM EDT on March 14, 2023.
* Tenders submitted after 2:00 PM EDT on March 14, 2023 will be deemed non-responsive.

==================================================================

- Preserved the essential content while condensing it to fit within a 400-word limit.
- Fix up spellings and capitalizations errors
- Met the language requirements to keep it in both English and French
